title: wine_Dragonette_2012_Seven_Syrah_(Santa_Barbara_County)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 56461.
country: US.
description: This blend comes from seven vineyards: John Sebastiano, Shadow Canyon, Thompson, Harrison Clarke, Watch Hill and Stolpman. Melded with 10% Grenache and 1% Viognier, it shows warm gingerbread and blackberry aromas, cut by pencil lead and anise. The flavors expertly balance ripeness with tannins and acidity, offering dynamic ollallieberry, pepper-crusted roast pork, wild herbs and a touch of vanilla on the finish..
designation: Seven.
points: 93.
price: 40.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Barbara County.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Dragonette 2012 Seven Syrah (Santa Barbara County).
variety: Syrah.
winery: Dragonette.
